title: max attribute
description: The min and max attributes indicate the allowed range of values for the element.

references.title: WHATWG HTML spec for the min and max attributes
HTML AAM for the max attribute applied to an input

assertions.title: convey the property
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know how the current value compares to the maximum value
examples: screen readers might announce the actual value of the maximum property.
screen readers might imply the value by conveying that the maximum has been reached
